Extracted Data.Name: Simran Gupta
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: Business Intelligence & Analytics driving sales strategy, inventory optimization, and campaign performance across high impact categories like Phones and TVs. Skilled in forecasting, segmentation, A/B testing, and data modeling, delivering data backed actionable insights. Adept at enabling demand driven planning, improving conversion funnels, and supporting strategic decisions across Sales, GTM, and Supply Chain in fast paced e commerce environments.

Experience.Title: Analytics Manager
Experience.Description: Led upsell campaigns during the festive season by segmenting 50K+ users using K Means clustering on behavioral and transaction data; drove 3 Cr+ incremental revenue. Developed a dynamic stocking algorithm to identify real time sell in and sell through gaps, replacing static monthly planning and improving product availability in high demand zones by 12%+. Enabled 2Mn+ monthly sales by delivering business insights on product placement, OOS risk, competition benchmarking, and distributor profiling to guide sales and trade marketing decisions. Optimized conversion rate on e commerce platform through A/B testing, boosting conversion rate by 40%, CTR by 15%, and session duration by 10%. Built time series forecasting models to project quarterly sales and inventory with 94% accuracy, reducing inventory overhang and improving replenishment planning. Created an inventory risk framework to flag and liquidate slow moving SKUs, helping reduce aging stock by 22% over 2 quarters through channel specific liquidation strategies

Experience.Title: Data Science Associate
Experience.Description: Marketing Mix Model: Optimized marketing impacting the bottom line of a prominent CPG client. Identified the key drivers of volume uplift, assessing the ROI for each marketing channel, and provided optimization and simulation strategies via Multivariate Regression. Delved into the impact of price reductions, competitor s prices and promotional activities on sales

Experience.Title: Equity Research Analyst
Experience.Description: Involved in equity research and industrial analysis and making research projects of the assigned companies. Exposed to other broking and wealth products of Kotak Securities.

Experience.Title: Credit Processor Analyst
Experience.Description: Conducted a study to understand the financial data analysis of SME customers of Kotak Mahindra Bank. Worked with a team that assessed the credit worthiness and loan limit of an individual or company.

Education: M.A Economics, Madras School of Economics, 2020
B.A Economics, Miranda House, Delhi University, 2018
Class XII – ISC, Nirmala Convent School, 2015
Class X – ICSE, Nirmala Convent School, 2013

Recommendations: Consider adding a **Projects** section to showcase practical application of skills and experience. This section could highlight independent projects or contributions to open-source initiatives, providing concrete evidence of abilities.

Include any relevant **Certifications** to validate expertise and demonstrate commitment to professional development. List certifications related to data science, analytics tools, or industry-specific knowledge to strengthen the resume.

Quantify achievements in the work experience section with specific **metrics and results**. Use numbers, percentages, and dollar amounts to highlight the impact of contributions in previous roles and make the accomplishments more compelling.

Tailor the **summary or objective** statement to align with the specific requirements of each job application. Highlight the most relevant skills and experience based on the job description to demonstrate a strong fit for the role.

While the resume is well-structured, ensure **consistent formatting** throughout to enhance readability. Pay attention to font sizes, spacing, and alignment to create a visually appealing and professional document.

Although the resume is generally well-written, proofread carefully to eliminate any potential **minor grammatical errors** or typos. Even small errors can detract from the overall impression of professionalism and attention to detail.
Leverage your **positions of responsibilities** and elaborate them a little more on the resume.

RESUME_TIPS: Quantify your achievements in inventory management at Xiaomi India by including metrics such as improved **inventory turnover ratio** or reduced **stock out percentages**. Highlight how your dynamic stocking algorithm influenced these KPIs.

In your Gain Insights Solutions experience, elaborate on how you used **Multivariate Regression** to provide simulation strategies. Mention specific improvements or cost savings achieved through your marketing mix optimization.

Add a section detailing your experience with **ERP systems** like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**, as proficiency in these systems is highly valued. Even mentioning exposure to these systems can make your resume stand out.

Expand on your proficiency in **SQL** by providing examples of how you used it to automate reporting or build dashboards for inventory health and store performance. Quantify the time savings or efficiency gains from these automations.

Demonstrate your understanding of **replenishment strategies** by including examples of how you defined and managed **min max levels** for different stores and SKUs at Xiaomi. Show how this improved **store fill rate**.

Include details on your experience with **omnichannel inventory management**, especially if you've worked with both retail and online channels. Mention any strategies you employed to optimize inventory across these channels, and the impact this had on metrics like **aging stock**.

Mention your experience with **ABC classification** and **EOQ** in the Skills section to show your understanding of inventory planning logic. Briefly describe how you applied these techniques in your previous roles, emphasizing their impact.

In the Xiaomi India section, detail how you collaborated with merchandising and sales teams to adjust demand forecasts for new launches and promotions. Quantify the impact of these adjustments on **forecast accuracy**.

Incorporate the term '**Aging stock**' when you describe how you managed the **inventory risk framework** at Xiaomi India to help in reducing **aging stock** by 22% over 2 quarters through channel specific liquidation strategies.

Include **Tableau** in your Skills section, as it is listed as an alternative to **Power BI** in the job description. Since you have experience with **Power BI**, learning **Tableau** will make you a more versatile candidate.
